title: co插件如何查原版箱子的打开记录
author: SakuraTao

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
co lookup a:container t:时间
然后点击箱子

replies.author: SakuraTao
replies.txt_content:
折叠 发表于 2020-3-4 18:55
co lookup a:container t:时间
然后点击箱子
这个貌似只能查玩家的
我希望的是右键箱子后可以看到箱子的打开记录和箱子被拿走了什么

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: SakuraTao
replies.txt_content:
折叠 发表于 2020-3-4 19:02
co i后点击箱子没有反应吗
没有，右键没反应。左键显示的是破坏记录

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content: co i右键箱子 不是co l

replies.author: SakuraTao
replies.txt_content:
EmptyLava 发表于 2020-3-4 19:03
co i右键箱子 不是co l
就是/co i没用

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
mkwwmka5 发表于 2020-3-4 19:04
就是/co i没用
删除配置文件，注意不是db结尾的数据库文件

replies.author: 红菜头糕
replies.txt_content:
# Track player interactions, such as when a player opens a door, presses
# a button, or opens a chest. Player interactions can't be rolled back.
player-interactions: true
你看看配置文件有没有这一项，而且是否是true
如果不是的话改成true然后/co reload
